Row.Text: Earn 40 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission.
Earn 45 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission.
Earn 50 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission.
Earn 55 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission.

Earn 70 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission, and reduce the [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence of other Civilizations with this City-State by the same amount. Earn additional [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence for each completed era. Has the ability to enter a rival player's territory without an Open Borders agreement.
Earn tons of [ICON_GOLD], but no [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission with this unit.
Grants Diplomatic Units +10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission. Bonus is exclusive to the Swedish Civilization (if using CSD's custom Trait for Sweden).
Grants +5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission.
Grants +5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission and +1 [ICON_MOVES] movement.
Grants +5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission, +1 [ICON_MOVES] movement for Diplomatic Units, and the ability to ignore terrain costs.
Grants +5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission and the ability to enter a rival player's territory without an Open Borders agreement.
+5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission with a City-State.
+5 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence when you conduct a Diplomatic Mission with a City-State, and the ability to enter a rival player's territory without an Open Borders agreement.
Grants +1 [ICON_MOVES] movement, +1 Sight, +10% Combat Bonus when attacking, and the ability to heal in non-friendly waters.
